channel.title: This is annoyin- read and please help!
channel.description:
Hey guys...
My moparscape webclient sometimes works in Mozilla and sometimes doesnt. In internet explorer it usually works, but in Mozilla it comes up with java error...
Any help? Do I need unblock moparisthebest.com from my mozilla... if yes how?

item.title: This is annoyin- read and please help!
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

For some reason, some ‘E-machine’ PC’s have JRE errors. You can install/uninstall all you like and it won’t work. Just download the client.

Read full topic
item.source: This is annoyin- read and please help!

item.title: This is annoyin- read and please help!
item.dc:creator: @Zeebo Zeebo
item.description:
@Zeebo wrote:

Maybe your java settings are different on Mozilla than on IE?

Read full topic
